thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Piaggio FY EBITDA Up 12.6 Pct At EUR 192.3 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Piaggio FY EBITDA Up 12.6 Pct At EUR 192.3 Mln
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - PIAGGIO & C SPA:
* FY EBITDA EUR 192.3 MILLION VERSUS EUR 170.7 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY REVENUE EUR 1.34 BILLION VERSUS EUR 1.31 BILLION YEAR AGO
* NET DEBT AT END-2017 EUR 446.7 MILLION
* FY UNCONSOLIDATED NET PROFIT EUR 20.6 MILLION VERSUS EUR 14.0 MILLION YEAR AGO
* PROPOSES DIVIDEND OF EUROCENT 5.5 PER SHARE * FY CONSOLIDATED NET PROFIT EUR 20.0 MILLION VERSUS EUR 14.0 MILLION YEAR AGO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
